author: Play On Tabletop
description:
The new Horus Heresy Miniatures are fire! We are thrilled with them. Now, that the miniatures are painted it is time for battle! We aim to go into production soon. Estimated release on YouTube is early August.

Thank you to Games Workshop for sending us the new Horus Heresy!

#TheHorusHeresy #NewHeresy #WarhammerCommunity #AdWIP
title: New Horus Heresy battle coming in August 2025.  #TheHorusHeresy #NewHeresy
